message:
Dear Mr. {{doc.lead_name}},
Thank you for connecting with Switch My Loan. Hope we could fulfill your requirements. Switch My
Loan will be the one stop solution for all your loan requirements.

We provide Personal Loans, Business Loans, Home Loans, Loan against property and Loan Against
Securities. We are specialized in Balance transfer loans.

Our processes are completely digitized. You sit back and relax, while we do all the hard-work for
your loan.

Regards,
Your Friendly loan buddy
Switch My Loan Pvt. Ltd.
